scripts.docker:build: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f services/api/Dockerfile -t canals-take-home-api:latest .
scripts.docker:build:tag: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f services/api/Dockerfile -t canals-take-home-api:${TAG:-latest} .
scripts.docker:build:push: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f services/api/Dockerfile -t canals-take-home-api:${TAG:-latest} --push .
